api year function YEAR Function Returns a four digit integer equal to the year portion of the specified Date or Date_Time value.
Year as N = YEAR( Date as D ) Year as N = YEAR( Date_Time as T )
>
date A variable containing a date value or a character string containing a legitimate representation of a date value ( ISDATE (Date_Value) = .T.).
Date_Time A variable containing a date-time value (type T).
Example If START contains 05/25/1995. ? year(START) = 1995 ? year(date() ) = 2006 ? year(now() ) = 2006
